item.title: BdERECTA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi1g46450 Gene Symbol: BdERECTA Gene Name: Genome: Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BdERECTA controls vasculature patterning and phloem-xylem organization in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: BjMTP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjMTP1 Gene Name: Putative metal transport protein 1 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: Steady-state mRNA levels of BjMTP1 were found to be enhanced 8.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC04g21390D Gene Symbol: BnaC4.BOR2 Gene Name: low-B (LB)-inducible Genome: rapeseed genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaC4.

item.title: CaPMEI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPMEI1 Gene Name: pectin methlyesterase inhibitor protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper pectin methylesterase inhibitor protein CaPMEI1 is required for antifungal activity, basal disease resistance and abiotic stress tolerance.

item.title: ClEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA1 Gene Name: α-expansin1 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: ClEXPA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA2 Gene Name: α-expansin2 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: CsiLAC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs6g07800.1 Gene Symbol: CsiLAC4 Gene Name: Citrus LACCASE-4 Genome: Orange Genomic Database Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsiLAC4’s role in xylem lignification was determined by mRNA hybridization and cytochemistry.

item.title: CsREV
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsREV Gene Name: REVOLUTA Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsREV predominantly localized in the cambium and xylem, and its expression pattern overlapped with the deposition of cellulose and lignin in leaf veins.

item.title: DcMYB7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_010745 Gene Symbol: DcMYB7 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 7 Genome: DH1 (orange) carrot genome Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Changing Carrot Color: Insertions in DcMYB7 Alter the Regulation of Anthocyanin Biosynthesis and Modification1.

item.title: GhNAC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D01G0636 Gene Symbol: GhNAC4 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 4 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhNAC4 promotes drought tolerance by regulating secondary cell wall biosynthesis and ribosomal protein homeostasis.

item.title: HvCaM1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU0Hr1G001270 Gene Symbol: HvCaM1 Gene Name: calmodulin 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Identified a salt-responsive calmodulin (HvCaM1) in a proteome study of barley (Hordeum vulgare) roots.

item.title: HvHKT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvHKT1|5 Gene Name: High-Affinity Potassium Transporter 1|5 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The HKT Transporter HvHKT1|5|HvHKT1|5 Negatively Regulates Salt Tolerance.

item.title: HVP10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G028910 Gene Symbol: HVP10 Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: This study reveals the molecular mechanism of HVP10 underlying salt tolerance and highlights its potential in improving crop salt tolerance Vacuolar H+-pyrophosphatase HVP10 enhances salt tolerance via promoting Na+ translocation into root vacuoles.

item.title: HvSPDT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvSPDT Gene Name: SULTR-like phosphorus distribution transporter Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: A crucial role for a node-localized transporter, HvSPDT, in loading phosphorus into barley grains.

item.title: LeFRK2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeFRK2 Gene Name: fructokinase2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeFRK2 is required for phloem and xylem differentiation and the transport of both sugar and water.

item.title: LOG1

item.title: PanNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PanWU01x14_292800 Gene Symbol: PanNOOT1 Gene Name: PanNODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Parasponia andersonii Functional Descriptions: PanNOOT1 is orthologous to Arabidopsis thaliana BLADE-ON-PETIOLE1 (AtBOP1) and AtBOP2, which are involved in the meristem-to-organ-boundary maintenance.

item.title: PbNAC71
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PbNAC71 Gene Name: dwarfism-related NAC TF Genome: Species: Pyrus communis Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor PbNAC71 regulates xylem and vessel development to control plant height.

item.title: PdGA20ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PdGA20ox1 Gene Name: gibberellin 20-oxidase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus densiflora Functional Descriptions: Wood forming tissue-specific bicistronic expression of PdGA20ox1 and PtrMYB221 improves both the quality and quantity of woody biomass production in a hybrid poplar.

item.title: PrCCoAOMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCCoAOMT Gene Name: caffeoyl-CoA O-methyltransferase Genome: Species: Pinus radiata Functional Descriptions: A cDNA clone encoding the lignin-related enzyme caffeoyl CoA 3-O-methyltransferase (CCoAOMT) was isolated from a Pinus radiata cDNA library derived from differentiating xylem.

item.title: PROT1;aaap20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb144010 Gene Symbol: PROT1 aaap20 Gene Name: amino acid/auxin permease20 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: PsAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsAS1 Gene Name: Asparagine synthetase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus sylvestris Functional Descriptions: Coordination of PsAS1 and PsASPG expression controls timing of re-allocated N utilization in hypocotyls of pine seedlings.

item.title: PsASPG
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsASPG Gene Name: L-asparaginase Genome: Species: Pinus sylvestris Functional Descriptions: Coordination of PsAS1 and PsASPG expression controls timing of re-allocated N utilization in hypocotyls of pine seedlings.

item.title: PtoERF15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.008G166100 Gene Symbol: PtoERF15 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The AP2/ERF transcription factor PtoERF15 confers drought tolerance via JA-mediated signaling in Populus.

item.title: PtomtAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtomtAPX Gene Name: mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: PtomtAPX, a mitochondrial ascorbate peroxidase, plays an important role in maintaining the redox balance of Populus tomentosa Carr.

item.title: PtoMYB142
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtoMYB142 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor PtoMYB142 enhances drought tolerance in Populus tomentosa by regulating gibberellin catabolism.

item.title: PtoMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G092200 Gene Symbol: PtoMYC2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Here, we identified and characterized an osmotic stress-induced ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 (PtoERF15) and its target, PtoMYC2b, which was involved in mediating vessel size, density, and cell wall thickness in response to drought in Populus tomentosa.

item.title: PtPHOR1_1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: POPTR_0007s03730 Gene Symbol: PtPHOR1_1 Gene Name: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 (PHOR1)-like Genes Regulate Shoot/root Growth, Starch Accumulation, and Wood Formation in Populus.

item.title: PtPHOR1_2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: POPTR_0005s05880 Gene Symbol: PtPHOR1_2 Gene Name: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 (PHOR1)-like Genes Regulate Shoot/root Growth, Starch Accumulation, and Wood Formation in Populus.

item.title: PtrDRIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.007G132700.1 Gene Symbol: PtrDRIF1 Gene Name: DIVARICATA AND RADIALIS INTERACTING FACTOR 1 Genome: Phytozome: Populus trichocarpa v3.

item.title: PtrMAN6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtrMAN6 Gene Name: Populus endo-1,4-β-mannanase Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Populus endo-beta-mannanase PtrMAN6 plays a role in coordinating cell wall remodeling with suppression of secondary wall thickening through generation of oligosaccharide signals.

item.title: PtrMYB074
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.015G082700 Gene Symbol: PtrMYB074 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Dimerization of PtrMYB074 and PtrWRKY19 mediates transcriptional activation of PtrbHLH186 for secondary xylem development in Populus trichocarpa.

item.title: PtrMYB221
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.004G174400.1 Gene Symbol: PtrMYB221 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 221 Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Wood forming tissue-specific bicistronic expression of PdGA20ox1 and PtrMYB221 improves both the quality and quantity of woody biomass production in a hybrid poplar.

item.title: PtrWRKY19
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.014G050000 Gene Symbol: PtrWRKY19 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Dimerization of PtrMYB074 and PtrWRKY19 mediates transcriptional activation of PtrbHLH186 for secondary xylem development in Populus trichocarpa.

item.title: PtrXB38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G070800.6 Gene Symbol: PtrXB38 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Expression quantitative trait loci mapping identified PtrXB38 as a key hub gene in adventitious root development in Populus.
